item.description: VHPC 2022 Schedule Date: June 2nd, 2022 Location & Room: Congress Center Hamburg (CCH), Hall Y2 - 2nd Floor (refer to the ISC-HPC pages for details) 08:45-09:00 Welcome Message from the VHPC’22 Chairs 09:00-10:00 Keynote Talk #1 rtla: finding the sources of OS noise on Linux, Daniel Bristot De Oliveira, Senior Principal Software Engineer in the real-time kernel team at Red Hat 10:00-11:00 Virtualization & Unikernels
